::: callout-tip
## Objective

At the end of this session, you will be able detect Heteroskedasticity, use the correct estimator when in presence of Heteroskedasticity, and understand the correction of p-value when doing multiple testing.
:::

## Session Outline

1.  Heteroskedasticity
2.  Correction of p-value
